title: >>> TIE-BREAKER
body_text:
The Countdown to 100
- lookin' pretty damn good. The "CREAMation 2", a wicked, chaotic birthday, and "Wall Ball". What's next? A spectacular rematch from the 84th installment of dodgeball featuring an invincible dodger and a master blocker.
basista v. marzarella 2
A very interesting story right here, one that may have never even taken place! And it's all Lenny's fault! How you ask? Good question.
The original plans for DODGEBALL 84 pitted two gifted young warriors one on one in a classic match-up:
Sascha Basista vs. Lenny Herrera
. Sound familiar!? But with all the hype and preparation surrounding the encounter, rumors began to circulate that award-winning Herrera would be unable to attend, leaving a void in the night's main event. Upon hearing the news, the "writer" immediately issued a back-up plan in Lenny's unfortunate absence.
Saturday came in a flash, and low and behold, the 18 year-old veteran was no where to be found. In lieu of Lenny, blocking icon Ray Marzarella stepped up and out, winning
Rimshot Contect #7
and the right to face Basista.
The back-court brawl on that April 21st night failed to produce a clearcut winner. Four games were equally divided, neither man satisfied with the outcome. It's now ten events later and maybe this time, things will be different.
sascha basista
If his past performances are any indication, this brash dodger will put his body on the line in the spirit of competition. And it's that unlimited amount of heart and desire that may take him straight to the top.
ray marzarella
The
PondScum
icon knows all the tricks of the trade, on and off the court. From his spectacular abilities with the painball to the months secretly devising the infamous
Invasion of LX3
, this legend will do whatever it takes to emerge with his hand raised in victory.
________________________________________
____________
Nothing bigger.
Coming
August 18
to Wall High School.
body_html:
The Countdown to 100 - lookin' pretty damn good. The "CREAMation 2", a wicked, chaotic birthday, and "Wall Ball". What's next? A spectacular rematch from the 84th installment of dodgeball featuring an invincible dodger and a master blocker.

basista v. marzarella 2
A very interesting story right here, one that may have never even taken place! And it's all Lenny's fault! How you ask? Good question.

The original plans for DODGEBALL 84 pitted two gifted young warriors one on one in a classic match-up: Sascha Basista vs. Lenny Herrera. Sound familiar!? But with all the hype and preparation surrounding the encounter, rumors began to circulate that award-winning Herrera would be unable to attend, leaving a void in the night's main event. Upon hearing the news, the "writer" immediately issued a back-up plan in Lenny's unfortunate absence.

Saturday came in a flash, and low and behold, the 18 year-old veteran was no where to be found. In lieu of Lenny, blocking icon Ray Marzarella stepped up and out, winning Rimshot Contect #7 and the right to face Basista.

The back-court brawl on that April 21st night failed to produce a clearcut winner. Four games were equally divided, neither man satisfied with the outcome. It's now ten events later and maybe this time, things will be different.

sascha basista
If his past performances are any indication, this brash dodger will put his body on the line in the spirit of competition. And it's that unlimited amount of heart and desire that may take him straight to the top.

ray marzarella
The PondScum icon knows all the tricks of the trade, on and off the court. From his spectacular abilities with the painball to the months secretly devising the infamous Invasion of LX3, this legend will do whatever it takes to emerge with his hand raised in victory.
____________________________________________________


Nothing bigger.
Coming August 18 to Wall High School.
